participant_1.background:
I treasure the watch my father gave me for my birthday because it is a reminder of our relationship.
I baked a lot of cakes for my family and friends last year.
i love to read and cook.
I broke my arm when I was a child, but it healed well.
since i have fibromyalgia , the harsher winters here in pa will be rough on me.

participant_2.background:
I hope my wedding planning business keeps booming as the weather warms up.
i wonder about what life in space would be like.
I got rejected from my dream job after putting all my heart and soul into the application process.
I went to a bakery and bought a bunch of cookies to bring home to my son.
my neighbor comes over all the time to watch rugby with me.

content.text: How is your day going?
Not too bad. Just got back from a wedding. I am a wedding planner.
That is so cool! I love love and weddings! What was your favorite part of the wedding?
The food was delicious. I hope my business keeps booming as the weather warms up. I would love to do more weddings this year!
That is great! I recently baked a lot of cakes for my family and friends. I love to bake and cook.
I love to bake too! I recently went to a bakery and bought a bunch of cookies to bring home to my son. He loves cookies.
That is so sweet. My son loves cookies too. I have fibromyalgia, so the harsher winters here in PA will be rough on me.
Oh no, I am sorry to hear that. I hope you stay warm this winter.
Thank you. I am going to try my best.
I am sure you will. You seem like a very strong person.
Thank you. I try my best.
I am sure you do.
I love talking to you. You are so nice!
I love talking to you too! You are very kind.
Thank you. You are so sweet!
You are welcome! I am glad I met you!
Me too! I hope we can talk again soon.
I would love that!
Great! I will send you a message later.
Sounds good
